description: November 1974 to promote agricultural development; a UN specialized agency members - (176) List A - (27 industrialized aid contributors) Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, NZ, Norway, Portugal, Russia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK, US List B -
